hero.introText: Web developer since 2021, focusing on modern, high-performance, and highly responsive digital products, always dedicated to better results and partnership with your company or professional life. Contact me and be part of this experience.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.aboutText: I am a 22-year-old passionate about technology, web development, music, and investments. I started studying programming in 2020 and have been fascinated by the technology field ever since. I found my area of specialization in web development in late 2021, where I began my path focusing on backend development and later frontend development. Today, I work creating innovative web pages, helping improve your business and professional profile.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.ignitersDesc: NextJS t-shirt e-commerce, integrated with Stripe payment API
projects.pizzaShopDesc: React page for restaurants delivery management, allowing the restaurant to list and control the orders
projects.githubBlogDesc: React blog to visualize all your GitHub issues, integrated with GitHub API
projects.dtMoneyDesc: React page for personal finance management, allowing users to track their expenses

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.text: My email is always open. If you need my help, want to connect, or have any suggestions, send me an email here, I'll do my best to respond as soon as possible!
contact.messageTextArea: Hi, how are you? My name is John Doe...

footer.thanksText: Thanks everybody for your attention to my portfolio!
